item.title: We may finally be getting a sequel to one of my favorite Chromebooks of 2021
item.description: We may finally be getting a sequel to one of my favorite Chromebooks of 2021 One of the most surprising and most delightful Chromebooks of the entire year in 2021 may finally be ready for a sequel.
